data.claim: Arif & Asad Storytelling Project exists in drills.pen with Season 1 containing 6 episodes: (1) The Magic Garden, (2) The Flying Kite, (3) The Robot Friend, (4) The Treasure Map, (5) The Super Chef, (6) The Grand Finale. Project card at node nO1pM (x:66140, y:0), Season Overview at node vbgfl (x:66140, y:900).
data.snippet: Episodes: 1-Magic Garden (talking plants), 2-Flying Kite (cloud adventure), 3-Robot Friend (building), 4-Treasure Map (neighborhood hunt), 5-Super Chef (kitchen chaos), 6-Grand Finale (all friends unite). Arif=8yo Lead Director (green #3D8A5A), Asad=5yo Story Creator (coral #D89575).
